Ref: CXP045/2023
Location: New Guelderland, KwaDukuza

Implement & maintain a safety system to ensure the company’s compliance to all relevant SHEQ legislation appropriate to operation management and client requirements.
Salary: R25 000 – R30 000 p/m

Main Duties include:

•Assist in the drafting of Safe work Procedures and Work Instructions that comply with ISO 9001, 14001 and 45001 standard requirements.

•Assist with the maintenance of the SHEQ System Manuals and Documentation control system.

•Assist with and supply of all HSE Tender document requirements timeously.

•Provide SHEQ awareness training to all staff.

•Prepare Safety statistics and reports at required intervals.

•Plan, schedule and execute monthly internal SHEQ audits and checks on contractors.

•Ensure that suppliers and subcontractors adhere to all safety requirements.

•Ensure the maintenance and upgrading of the Health, Environment and Safety Standards.

•Plan, schedule and manage all medical and health monitoring requirements

•Assist with investigations into accidents or incidents

•Developing task-based risk assessments in conjunction with appropriate teams/persons

•Ensure that adequate fire-fighting and first aid equipment are available and personnel are trained and coordinate fire and emergency drills.

•Ensure the management of PPE for all employees. And assist operational teams with on-site HSE activities and tasks.

•Maintain Safety Precautions and sound housekeeping principles

•Evaluate training requirements to ensure legal compliance

Criteria:

•Relevant SHEQ related tertiary qualification

•5 – 7 years’ experience in a SHEQ environment

•Experience in waste management is advantageous

•Computer skills – Google suite

•SAMTRAC

•HIRA advantageous

•First Aid Level 1 advantageous

•Incident/Accident investigations experience

•Excellent communication skills in English
